TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit RandomNumberGenerator extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class RandomNumberGenerator Implements IDisposable
public ref class RandomNumberGenerator abstract : IDisposable
.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit RandomNumberGenerator extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示加密随机数生成器的所有实现从中派生的抽象类。

span.span: Represents the abstract class from which all implementations of cryptographic random number generators derive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加密随机数生成器创建加密型强随机值。Cryptographic random number generators create cryptographically strong random values. 若要创建随机数生成器，请调用 @System.Security.Cryptography.RandomNumberGenerator.Create 方法。To create a random number generator, call the @System.Security.Cryptography.RandomNumberGenerator.Create method. 这是通过调用派生类的构造函数 @System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider （在所有平台上都不可用）而获得的。This is preferred over calling the constructor of the derived class @System.Security.Cryptography.RNGCryptoServiceProvider, which is not available on all platforms.

span.span: Cryptographic Services

span.span: Initializes a new instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能创建抽象类的实例。You cannot create an instance of an abstract class. 应用程序代码将创建派生类的新实例。Application code will create a new instance of a derived class. 对于加密随机数生成器的实现，请使用派生类 。For an implementation of a cryptographic random number generator, use the derived class .

span.span: Creates an instance of an implementation of a cryptographic random number generator.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，释放由 类的当前实例占用的非托管资源。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, releases the unmanaged resources used by the current instance of the class.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
Public Sub Dispose ()
public: virtual void Dispose();
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，释放由 类的当前实例使用的所有资源。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用后 `Dispose` ，必须释放对的所有引用， 以便垃圾回收器能够回收占用的内存 。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: virtual void Dispose(bool disposing);
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 在派生类中被重写时，释放由 使用的非托管资源，也可以根据需要释放托管资源。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共 `Dispose()` 方法和 `Finalize` 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the `Finalize` method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true` 。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Finalize``Dispose`在设置为的情况调用 `disposing` `false` 。`Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时 ，请注意不要引用先前在调用时已释放的对象 。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息 ，请参阅 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关和的详细 信息 ，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字节数组的长度决定了生成的随机字节数。The length of the byte array determines how many random bytes are produced. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个长度为100个字节的随机序列，并将其存储在中 `random` 。The following example creates a random sequence 100 bytes long and stores it in `random`. public: static int GetInt32(int toExclusive);
static member GetInt32 : int -> int

span.span: The exclusive upper bound of the random range.

summary.span: 使用加密型强随机数生成器生成介于 0（含）与指定上限（不含）之间的随机整数。

span.span: Generates a random integer between 0 (inclusive) and a specified exclusive upper bound using a cryptographically strong random number generator.

returns.span: 介于 0（含）与 （不含）之间的随机整数。

span.span: A random integer between 0 (inclusive) and (exclusive).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 上限专用于从数组、范围或列表传入长度值。The upper bound is exclusive to enable passing in a length value from an array, span, or list. 因为它是一个独占上限，所以此方法永远不会生成 。Because it is an exclusive upper bound this method can never generate . 此方法使用丢弃重试策略，以避免简单的模块化算法操作生成的低值偏差。This method uses a discard-and-retry strategy to avoid the low value bias that a simple modular arithmetic operation would produce.

span.span: The parameter is less than or equal to 0.

span.span: Generates a random integer between a specified inclusive lower bound and a specified exclusive upper bound using a cryptographically strong random number generator.

returns.span: 介于 （含）与 （不含）之间的随机整数。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 上限专用于从数组、范围或列表传入长度值。The upper bound is exclusive to enable passing in a length value from an array, span, or list. 因为它是一个独占上限，所以此方法永远不会生成 。Because it is an exclusive upper bound this method can never generate . 此方法使用丢弃重试策略，以避免简单的模块化算法操作生成的低值偏差。This method uses a discard-and-retry strategy to avoid the low value bias that a simple modular arithmetic operation would produce. 和都允许使用负值 `fromInclusive` `toExclusive` 。Negative values are permitted for both `fromInclusive` and `toExclusive`.

exception.span: 参数小于或等于 参数。
